idea-plugin.name: Branch in Window Title
idea-plugin.description: If a git repository is detected in the parent directory of a module, the current branch name is appended to the project name in the window title. If no git repository is present, the default behaviour / project name is used. This can be used to automate time allocation to ticketing systems via window managers such as WiseTime.
idea-plugin.change-notes: Version 0.5.3 - Added git worktrees support. Version 0.5.2 - Improved description and docs. Version 0.5.0 - Initial release.
